name: Bomb Catchers
description:
In this local multiplayer game, compete with each other to see who can hold the bomb the longest! While holding the bomb, your star meter increases, but every 10 seconds the bomb will explode. You win if either your star meter gets full or if your opponent dies. Steal the bomb from your opponent, or throw it at them as it’s about to explode.

This game is mostly a prototype combining aspects of “Hot potato” and “King of the hill”-type minigames.
